testcase.name: Clear Bororwing Estimate form
testcase.system-out: Given User navigated to borrowing estimate page.............................passed Then Page is available for the user.........................................passed When I check "Single" for "Application type"................................passed And I select "0" for "Number of dependants".................................passed And I check "Home to live in" for "Property you would like to buy"..........passed And I fill in "80000" for "Your income (before tax)"........................passed And I fill in "10000" for "Your other income"...............................passed And I fill in "500" for "Living expenses"...................................passed And I fill in "0" for "Current home loan repayments"........................passed And I fill in "100" for "Other loan repayments".............................passed And I fill in "0" for "Other commitments"...................................passed And I fill in "10000" for "Total credit card limits"........................passed When I press "Start over"...................................................passed Then I should see "Single" checked in "Application type"....................passed And I should see "0" selected in dropdown "Number of dependants"............passed And I should see "Home to live in" checked in "Property you would like to buy".passed And I should see "0" in textbox "Your income (before tax)"..................passed And I should see "0" in textbox "Your other income".........................passed And I should see "0" in textbox "Living expenses"...........................passed And I should see "0" in textbox "Current home loan repayments"..............passed And I should see "0" in textbox "Other loan repayments".....................passed And I should see "0" in textbox "Other commitments".........................passed And I should see "0" in textbox "Total credit card limits"..................passed
